entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm.
